select poo010id, pocotype, isassign, orderfield, orderfieldnm, fieldorder from ( select IFNULL(b.poo010id,0) as poo010id , b.pocotype, IFNULL(b.isassign,'N') as isassign ,CASE POSITION('additem' IN IFNULL(b.orderfield, a.CODE)) WHEN 0 THEN IFNULL(b.orderfield, a.CODE) WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT_WS('@', orderfield, fieldname, fieldvalue) END as orderfield , a.CODE_NM as orderfieldnm , IFNULL(fieldorder, 1000) as fieldorder from LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE a left outer join ismpoo010 b on a.CODE = b.orderfield and b.poo010id = #poo010id# and b.pocotype = #pocotype# where a.CODE_ID = 'ISM010' and a.use_at = 'Y' union select IFNULL(b.poo010id,0) as poo010id , b.pocotype, IFNULL(b.isassign,'N') as isassign ,CASE POSITION('additem' IN IFNULL(b.orderfield, a.CODE)) WHEN 0 THEN IFNULL(b.orderfield, a.CODE) WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT_WS('@', orderfield, fieldname, fieldvalue) END as orderfield , b.fieldname as orderfieldnm , IFNULL(fieldorder, 1000) as fieldorder from LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE a left outer join ismpoo010 b on a.CODE = b.orderfield and b.poo010id = #poo010id# and b.pocotype = #pocotype# where a.CODE_ID = 'ISM0B0' and a.use_at = 'Y' and b.isassign = 'Y' ) a order by fieldorder asc

SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS SORTNO , a.processdate , a.bycname , a.bycusername , a.regid , a.uploadfilename , a.status , a.rcvuseremail , a.receivetype FROM ( SELECT processdate , (select bycname from ismbyc010 where byc010id =a.byc010id ) bycname , bycusername , regid , IF(uploadfilename='', 'NO_FILE', uploadfilename) uploadfilename , CASE a.status WHEN 1 THEN '출고전' WHEN 2 THEN '출고대기' WHEN 3 THEN '출고완료' WHEN 4 THEN '출고지연' ELSE '반품취소' END status , rcvuseremail , receivetype FROM ismpom010 a GROUP BY processdate, bycname, bycusername, regid, uploadfilename, status, rcvuseremail, receivetype ORDER BY uploadfilename ASC ) a, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE 1 = 1
DATE_FORMAT(IF(a.processdate = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.processdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY)),'%Y-%m-%d') >= #dtSearch_frPoDt#
DATE_FORMAT(IF(a.processdate = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.processdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY)),'%Y-%m-%d') <= #dtSearch_toPoDt#
a.byc010id = #dtSearch_bycNm#
a.bycusername = #dtSearch_sndNm#
ORDER BY SORTNO DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS SORTNO , DATE_FORMAT(a.PROCESSDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS PROCESSDATE , (select bycname from ismbyc010 where byc010id =a.byc010id ) bycname , a.bycusername , a.regid FROM ismpom010 a, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE 1 = 1
DATE_FORMAT(IF(a.PROCESSDATE = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.PROCESSDATE, INTERVAL 0 DAY)),'%Y-%m-%d') >= #dtSearch_frPoDt#
DATE_FORMAT(IF(a.PROCESSDATE = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.PROCESSDATE, INTERVAL 0 DAY)),'%Y-%m-%d') <= #dtSearch_toPoDt#
a.byc010id = #dtSearch_bycNm#
a.bycusername = #dtSearch_sndNm#
GROUP BY PROCESSDATE, bycname, a.bycusername, a.regid ) PO
